
```{r}

header <- c( "chr", "start", "end", "count" )
df_kc <- read_tsv("/Users/cmdb/qb25-answers/Week 1/hg19-kc-count.bed", col_names = header)


ggplot(df_kc, aes(x = start, y = count)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(.~ chr, scales = "free") +
  labs(
    x = "Chromosome",
    y = "Gene Density",
  ) 
  
ggsave("exercise1.png")
```
